Module io.helidon.integrations.oci.vault
Package io.helidon.integrations.oci.vault

Interface OciVaultRx

  • public interface OciVaultRx
    Reactive APIs for OCI Vault.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  OciVaultRx.Builder
      Fluent API builder for OciVaultRx.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String ENDPOINT_FORMAT
      Default endpoint format for KMS.
      static String KMS_HOST_PREFIX
      Host name prefix for key management service (KMS).
      static String OCI_ENDPOINT_FORMAT
      Default endpoint format for secrets.
      static String RETRIEVAL_HOST_PREFIX
      Host name prefix for secrets retrieval.
      static String SECRET_API_VERSION
      Version of Secret API supported by this client.
      static String SECRET_BUNDLE_API_VERSION
      Version of Secret Bundle API supported by this client.
      static String VAULTS_HOST_PREFIX
      Host name prefix.
